article.Heading: Inside Bihar: People demand better infra to improve livelihood
article.Summary: While the government has worked to electrify villages in Bihar, there still is a long way to go in order to improve lives of the people in the state.
article.Body:
In his Independence Day speech in 2014, Prime Minister Narendra Modi had promised electrification of over 18,000 villages across India by may 2018.

While the government has worked to electrify villages in Bihar, there still is a long way to go. However, the half-baked efforts of government have disappointed citizens in Bihar. Issues such as falling wires, breakage and overloading are constant hurdles for the people.
